Name: Lords of Kingdoms
About the game: Lords of Kingdoms is a multiplayer online war game. Turn your small castle into a mighty fortress and become ruler of the greatest realm. Features: Build and manage your city, create new towns as you grow. Three PVE modes: Wild Land, War of Honor and Expedition. Five PVP modes: Support, Arena, Plunder, Destroy or Exile. Tons of bonuses and rewards help new players grow fast. Level up heroes or craft legendary artifacts to improve their abilities. Watch battles in real time. World conquest event for a game world starts in 60 days, the world enters a new period after that. Supports rally attack.
